<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>

This is the code from the I Stand with Ahmed Arduino Binary clock Workshop #IStandWithAhmed workshop. Its a simple binary count up clock using a WS2811 LED strip and an Arduino. The source code as always can be found on my github page. [https://github.com/funvill/ArduinoBinaryClock](https://github.com/funvill/ArduinoBinaryClock)
